sledgehammer.interfaces

Interface CommandListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoreCommandListener, DiscordCommandListener, FactionsCommandListener, ModuleChat, NPCCommandListener, PermissionsCommandListener

    public interface CommandListener
    Interface that handles the registration and execution of Commands in the Sledgehammer engine.
    Author:
    Jab

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] getCommands() 
      java.lang.String getPermissionNode(java.lang.String command) 
      void onCommand(Command command, Response response)
      Handles a Command.
      java.lang.String onTooltip(Player player, Command command) 

    • Method Detail

      • getCommands

        java.lang.String[] getCommands()
        Returns:
        Returns a String Array of commands that are interpreted in the CommandListener.

      • onCommand

        void onCommand(Command command,
               Response response)
        Handles a Command.
        Parameters:
        command - The Command to handle.
        response - The Response to apply the Result and any additional information to pass back to the author of the Command.

      • onTooltip

        java.lang.String onTooltip(Player player,
                           Command command)
        Parameters:
        player - The Player requesting the Commands tool-tip description.
        command - The Command issued.
        Returns:
        Returns a String tool-tip description. If the Player is not permitted to use the Command issued, then null should be returned.

      • getPermissionNode

        java.lang.String getPermissionNode(java.lang.String command)
        Parameters:
        command - The String command to resolve.
        Returns:
        Returns a resolved String permission-node for the String command given.
